hero_subheader: Pick the right no-code stack, deploy fast, and share your AI app without touching a server.

section_descriptions.recommender: Answer a few questions and get a stack with clear reasons and trade-offs.
section_descriptions.deploy: Follow a 10-step checklist to launch your app, copyable and trackable.
section_descriptions.integrations: Connect tools (Colab ↔️ Spaces, Lovable ↔️ Vercel, Bubble ↔️ Zapier) with pitfalls to avoid.
section_descriptions.limits: Know free-tier limits before you hit them.
section_descriptions.troubleshoot: Common errors, likely causes, and quick fixes.
section_descriptions.showcases: Live examples to copy and learn from.
section_descriptions.live-demos: Interactive demos you can run in the browser to preview behavior and data flows.
section_descriptions.launch-plan: Generate a shareable timeline and checklist for your specific project.
section_descriptions.free-tier-stress: Quick simulation of limits to predict where you’ll hit quotas.
section_descriptions.faqs: The answers most people need on day one.
